author: Nancy Odindo
title: Bomet Church Under Fire for Assaulting Woman in Bid to 'Cleanse Evil': "This Is Not Christianity"
text:
Bomet Church Under Fire for Assaulting Woman in Bid to ‚ÄòCleanse Evil‚Äô: "This Is Not Christianity"
Nancy Odindo, a journalist at TUKO.co.ke, brings over four years of experience covering politics, news, and feature stories across digital and print media in Kenya.
Bomet - An elderly woman was burned at the Bethel of Jesus Ministry International in Kapkwen after being accused of practicing witchcraft.
What happened inside Kapkwen church in Bomets?
The shocking incident, which took place within the church compound, has sparked public outrage, with calls for the arrest of the church leaders and the closure of the institution.
According to witnesses, the woman was brought to the church with alleged magical items, including snakes, frogs, and traditional medicine.
According to video footage shared by Citizen TV, during a prayer session, she reportedly collapsed as congregants attempted to rid her of her supposed demonic possessions. Church members then carried her outside and set a fire, claiming to be burning her alleged witchcraft items.
‚ÄúShe came with her witchcraft items, such as snakes, frogs, and drugs. When she tried to remove those things, she fell. The pastor helped her, and we decided to take her outside and burn them. Anyone who brings such items, we burn them. We cannot allow them to take them back after being delivered,‚Äù a church member stated.
The woman reportedly screamed in different voices as she was carried over the fire, which worshippers interpreted as her demons being cast out.
Inside the church, several women were seen lying on the floor, engaged in intense prayer.
The incident has ignited public condemnation, with many Kenyans calling for immediate action against the church leadership. Some have demanded stricter regulations to curb criminal activities in religious institutions.
The case has also raised concerns about the rise of extreme religious practices and the exploitation of vulnerable individuals under the guise of deliverance prayers.
How did Kenyans react to Bomet church assault incident?
@Just__Irene
"Can we get some regulation on these churches? They're getting out of hand."
@bungomaduke
"They should be arrested. This is not what Christianity is all about! Sad."
@princejob55
"We all need to visit Mathare National Teachers and Referral Hospital for some checkups. This is getting out of hand."
@WanguWaMakeri22
"They should be arrested immediately! Such denominations deserve closure ASAP. üò≠üò≠"
@owobuya
"This is criminal. Those involved should be arrested, and the church closed completely. ‚òπÔ∏è"
MosesAmone
"Total madness. üò†üò≥ It's unfortunate that most of these so-called pastors or religious leaders can't be arrested or held responsible because they are, in most cases, conduits for corrupt politicians and governments."
@Rosewn88
"This is a crime committed in the church. The law should take its course."
@21withtafari
"Maybe it's high time we talk about the church and how manipulative those church leaders can be. Sasa hii ni nini?"
@JoeKimani383500
"Let the law take the course immediately. This isn't the faith I subscribed to. Very wrong!"
@2hikari22
"I can't imagine someone doing this to grandma. It's so disheartening to watch; hopefully, she was rescued."
More to follow...
Source: TUKO.co.ke
Nancy Odindo (Current affairs editor) I have one year of experience in print media and more than four years in digital media. I am currently working with Tuko.co.ke as a Current Affairs junior editor. I have attended training on managing sexual harassment and gender equality and inclusion by WAN-IFRA and Google News Initiative (GNI) News Lab workshop designed to help journalists find, verify and tell their stories. Email: nancy.odindo@tuko.co.ke/nancyodindo@gmail.com

author: The Maritime Executive
title: Maritime Aid Pier Installed in Gaza for the Third Time
text:
The temporary pier for Palestinian relief aid has returned to its beach site in Gaza once more, defying rumors that it might soon be canceled.
Beginning in March, the U.S. military began deploying a complex cargo delivery system called Joint Logistics Over The Shore (JLOTS) to bring much-needed food aid into Gaza. This capability consists of a temporary pier, an offshore receiving station and a flotilla of landing craft. It has proven effective in previous deployments, like the response effort for the Haitian earthquake of 2010.
The Pentagon expected that the JLOTS system could handle up to 40 percent of Gaza's aid needs, but the operation has been beset by repeated problems - many related to its narrow operating window and its unsheltered location. Elements of the system are designed for service in Sea State 3 and below, and moderate swells are too rough for its capabilities.
The floating structure broke up in rougher weather in late May and had to be removed to the nearby port of Ashdod to be repaired. Last week, it was removed from the beach again in order to avoid more damage from wave action, and has now returned to service for the third time, according to Central Command.
At about 0900 hours Wednesday, U.S. military personnel reanchored the pier on the beach; CENTCOM emphasized that "at no time during this event did U.S. troops enter Gaza." On Thursday, maritime deliveries resumed, and trucks began ferrying aid cargoes down the pier and onto shore. A record 650 tonnes of food and other goods were delivered during the day, the command said.
Taken together with previous deliveries, the maritime corridor has transferred 4,160 tonnes of cargo to a marshaling area on the beach, where it will remain until further notice. Aid NGOs stopped distributing the food from the maritime corridor after a large-scale Israeli military operation on June 8, and the land-side half of the operation has been suspended pending a security review. The overall security situation in Gaza has deteriorated significantly over the past several weeks, and armed gangs have disrupted food distribution efforts within the territory.
Even if the aid were delivered to recipients, the maritime transport volume falls short of target, amounting to an average of roughly 120 tonnes per day since the causeway entered service in mid-May. This amounts to eight typical truckloads per day, roughly five percent of the goal.
Many aid NGOs and U.S. political leaders have called for aid resources to be redirected to cross-border trucking instead, leveraging commercial port infrastructure in Egypt and Israel.
"From a purely cost-based analysis, investing in a pier off the coast of Gaza is an inefficient use of our defense budget," argued Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) last week. "The pier project has proven to be a logistical nightmare, with significant challenges and costs far outweighing any potential benefits."
Mace has sponsored a successful amendment to the annual defense spending bill that would ban any funding for a pier in Gaza next fiscal year. But given the challenges, the project could be suspended by the end of the month , according to rumors from Washington.
Pentagon Press Secretary Maj. Gen. Pat Ryder (USAF) pushed back on these reports in a press conference Thursday. "While it's always been our intention for the pier to be a temporary solution as part of the broader international effort to surge humanitarian assistance into Gaza to meet the urgent needs of the Palestinian people, we have not established an end date for this mission as of now," Ryder said.

author: Harsh Rana
title: Eddie Hearn Tells Simon Jordan to ‚ÄúPipe Down‚Äù as He Threatens to ‚ÄúSchool‚Äù Him Again - EssentiallySports
text: The rivalry between [Eddie Hearn ](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/eddie-hearn/)and Simon Jordan is not new, and none of them are showing any signs of slowing down. The two have been out for each other throats because of their different opinions regarding boxing and integrity in sports. But the boiling point came in 2023 when the duo engaged in an hour-long debate on TalkSPORT talking about various things. Since then, the pair has been involved in constant back-and-forth online and Jordan has publicly criticized Hearn for his involvement with His Excellency Turki Alalshikh. But a new angle was added to this rivalry when Hearn claimed that the sports pundit ‚Äúbegged‚Äù for a meeting with His Excellency and Jordan hit back and called the Matchroom Promoter- a ‚ÄúFool.‚Äù None of them are ready to let even one word slide, as Hearn hit back and brutally warned Jordan. Eddie Hearn promises Jordan another schooling lesson ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this ad Hearn replied to Jordan without wasting any time and asked the latter to, ‚ÄúPipe down or I will have to come in and school you again üòâ,‚Äù hinting at another appearance on TalkSPORT. What‚Äôs your reaction? Eddie Hearn just told Simon Jordan to "pipe down"! React! Reactions Honestly this man‚Äôs a fool ! Never once asked for a meeting with anyone in Saudi . Ironically I was asked to meet them on Mon sept 16 and I couldn‚Äôt make it ü§∑‚ôÇÔ∏è They then said next day , I tried to re arrange meetings they then said they can‚Äôt make it . [https://t.co/wCtNx6U8k8]‚Äî Simon Jordan (@Sjopinion10) [September 26, 2024] The last time Hearn appeared on TalkSPORT, where Jordan criticized the Matchroom Boxing promoter‚Äôs way of handling certain boxing events, fighters management, and promotional deals. Jordan even questioned the integrity and ethics of Hearn and how he conducts business. Known for his outspokenness, Hearn retorted back in a furious nature and [defended his way of doing business](https://www.essentiallysports.com/boxing-news-eddie-hearn-brands-he-turki-alalshikh-critics-almost-borderline-racist-boxing-insider-rallies-in-support/) while challenging Jordan‚Äôs lack of knowledge of the boxing world. ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this ad Many boxing fans agreed with Hearn and his way of doing business as it is expanding opportunities and attracting more eyes to the sport. In the fans‚Äô eyes, Hearn was the clear winner of the argument, and according to the promoter, he won‚Äôt shy away from making another appearance at the talk show to teach Jordan some more. However, let‚Äôs get ready for some throwback. Jordan calls Hearn a ‚Äòfool‚Äô The latest chapter in this rivalry started when Jordan accused Hearn and [Frank Warren](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/frank-warren/) of ‚Äúbullying‚Äù Boxxer chief Ben Shalom during the [Anthony Joshua](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/anthony-joshua/) vs. [Daniel Dubois](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/daniel-dubois/) undercard fight. During the undercard fight, Hearn and Shalom got into a heated exchange, opening a window for Jordan to attack. Hearn and Warren both hit back at Jordan and the Matchroom Boxing promoter called the latter a ‚Äúrogue hero of controversy.‚Äù Hearn further clarified that Jordan asked for a meeting with HE Turki Alalshikh. ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this ad Jordan, who has been against the Saudi regime in boxing for a long time, denied the accusation as he came out with guns blazing. He not only called Hearn a ‚Äúfool‚Äù but also stated that he ‚ÄúNever once asked for a meeting with anyone in Saudi.‚Äù He further clarified that he was asked to meet the royals on September 16, but he couldn‚Äôt make it and further attempts to arrange another meeting were unsuccessful. Hearn did not take this disrespect lightly and hit back at Jordan and savagely warned Jordan. What do you think about this ongoing beef between Eddie Hearn and Simon Jordan? Do you agree with Hearn‚Äôs way of conducting the business? Let us know your thoughts down below.

author: Aniket Srivastava
title: Buffalo Bills are Giving $20 an Hour, Free Food to Snow Shovelers Amidst Hostile Weather, But Fans Want Something Else in Return - The SportsRush
text: Buffalo Bills are Giving $20 an Hour, Free Food to Snow Shovelers Amidst Hostile Weather, But Fans Want Something Else in Return [Aniket Srivastava](/author/aniketsrivastava/) |Published Winter is hitting Buffalo hard, and the Highmark Stadium is bearing the brunt of the rough weather with a thick blanket of snow. In an unusual move, the Buffalo Bills have issued a statement, asking for people‚Äôs help in clearing the snow ahead of Sunday‚Äôs Wild Card Game. While they had pretty good compensation for offer, fans were looking to sweeten the pot. Advertisement The Buffalo Bills are inviting individuals aged 18 and older to help shovel snow inside the home turf. Shovelers can begin their work at 10:00 p.m. on Saturday night and continue till Sunday Morning if necessary. It‚Äôs not just voluntary work, as people registering for the job will get $20 per hour accompanied by complimentary food. Advertisement Loading embed instagram https://www.instagram.com/p/C2BdwVpN6G1/?utm_source=ig_embed&utm_campaign=loading Those with proper identification are welcome to participate and should dress appropriately for the challenging weather. Bringing personal shovels is encouraged too if possible. Interested candidates can also pre-register by clicking [here](https://form.jotform.com/220033718778156). Moreover, one can also proceed to the Jani-King office trailer near the team‚Äôs store on Abbott Road for registration. The collaborative efforts aim to prepare the venue for the upcoming Bills‚Äô Wildcard Playoff game against the Pittsburgh Steelers. The Bills fans are enthusiastic about pitching in, and while they appreciate the $20 payment, they‚Äôre curious about an additional perk. Following the viral spread of the Bills‚Äô statement online, fans eagerly inquired whether the shovelers would also get to attend the game for free. Advertisement Loading embed tweet https://twitter.com/anikets67918182/status/1746083496668643698?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw One fan stated, ‚ÄúCap the amount of people that can help shovel, then just pay them in game day tickets.‚Äù Another one stated, ‚ÄúThey gonna get a seat too??‚Äù A different one mentioned, ‚ÄúNah you gonna have to give me tix to the game if I come shovel‚Äù Someone else wrote, ‚ÄúBut do they get a ticket to the game though lol.‚Äù In the 2023 season, the [Buffalo Bills](https://thesportsrush.com/tag/buffalo-bills/) are heading to the playoffs for the fifth consecutive time. Despite spending most of the season in the second spot in the AFC East, they secured the division title by beating the Miami Dolphins 21-14 in Week 18. Now, as the No. 2 seed in the AFC, the Bills are gearing up to face the No. 7 seed Pittsburgh Steelers in the first round of the playoffs. Buffalo Bills Fans Shoveled Through Snowstorms Bills fans lending a hand with shovels is not a new sight. In the previous season, during Week 11, the [Cleveland Browns](https://thesportsrush.com/tag/cleveland-browns/) were set to play against the Buffalo Bills at Highmark Stadium. However, a snowstorm in Buffalo prompted the relocation of the game to Ford Field in Detroit. To ensure the Bills players reached the airport on time, dedicated Bills fans took it upon themselves to clear the driveways and roads, showcasing their support for the team. Loading embed tweet https://twitter.com/_1Sledge/status/1594014408887349248?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw The Bills‚Äô star player expressed gratitude on social media for the fans who, armed with shovels and snowblowers, cleared the roads outside their homes. The Bills Mafia did not let the efforts of their fans go in vain and gifted them a 31-23 win against the Cleveland Browns. The Buffalo Bills fanbase is renowned for its unwavering dedication. Even in the toughest weather conditions, they stand by their team. Once again, the call is out for them to lend a hand, this time in clearing the snow from the stadium. There‚Äôs no doubt they‚Äôll brave the cold to ensure a clear path for their team, eager to witness a victory in the Wildcard game. Advertisement Share this article

author: AFP
title: Boxing Day Test: Pat Cummins the hero as Australia beat Pakistan to win series | Cricket News - Times of India
text: MELBOURNE: A fired-up Pat Cummins bagged five wickets and 10 in the match to earn Australia a nail-biting 79-run win in the second Test and clinch the series against a battling Pakistan on Friday.Set 317 for victory, the visitors put up a stellar fight as they chased their first Test triumph in Australia since 1995.AS IT HAPPENEDBut they were dismissed for 237, with the last five wickets falling for 18 runs.Australian skipper Cummins was the chief destroyer, taking 5-49 to go with his first innings 5-48 -- only the second 10-wicket haul of his Test career.Mitchell Starc chipped in with 4-55 as the tail collapsed after Shan Masood (60), Agha Salman (50) and Babar Azam (41) gave them a fighting chance.‚Äî cricketcomau (@cricketcomau) \"Little bit twitchy, felt okay but they were batting pretty nicely,\" said Cummins.\"Anything with a three in front of it was the aim, so we got that,\" he added of the target they wanted to set Pakistan. \"Felt like we had enough to bowl at but a little bit tight.\"It was always going to be a tough task, with the highest-ever successful fourth innings run chase at the Melbourne Cricket Ground the 332-7 England managed in 1928, with no other team getting past 300.\"We have to look at the bigger picture. The smiles are that there are a lot of positives,\" said Pakistan captain Masood.\"This is the way we want to play Test cricket, fighting until the end and a result was possible for us. A lot to work on. But this is a blueprint.\"Opener Abdullah Shafique departed for four during a tricky session before lunch, caught by Usman Khawaja in the slips off Starc following a period of intense pressure.Imam-ul-Haq survived the initial blitz, but was no match for Cummins after the break, with the pacer sending down a probing ball that nipped back and trapped him lbw for 12.Masood was given out lbw by the umpire on 12, but it was overturned on review and he quickly got back in his stride.He took a nasty ball to the ribs that needed treatment, but was undeterred and raced to a gutsy 50 before Cummins again came to Australia's rescue, enticing an edge to Steve Smith.There was plenty resting on the shoulders of Azam as the side's premier batter and he looked in good nick.‚Äî MCG (@MCG) But after reaching 41, Josh Hazlewood got a ball to jag back and it clattered into his off stump.Mohammad Rizwan also looked dangerous on his way to 35 before Cummins again worked his magic, with Alex Carey collecting a catch behind the stumps after the ball went off the batsman's glove.Cummins then removed Aamer Jamal and Shaheen Shah Afridi in quick succession before Starc cleaned up.The Pakistanis padded up after the hosts were all out in their second innings for 262, after resuming on 187-6.Mir Hamza was the best of the bowlers with 4-32, while Afridi took 4-76.Carey slammed 53 to help Australia build their overnight lead.He resumed on 16 after Australia had bounced back from 16-4 thanks to an attacking 96 from Mitchell Marsh and Smith's gutsy 50.Carey, who made his first and only Test hundred in Melbourne a year ago, hit consecutive fours in his first over off Hasan Ali to build confidence.At the other end, Starc lived dangerously and fell for nine with the impressive Afridi getting the breakthrough on a pitch still offering a bit for the bowlers.Azam took the sharp chance at slip after Starc miscued a drive.Cummins made a breezy 16 but was caught behind by Rizwan off Jamal, who then bowled Lyon for 11, with Carey the last man out, lbw to Hamza.The final Test of the three-match series is in Sydney next week.

author: Kirstyn Clark
title: Dover City Councilman Fred Neil Re-Elected at 91 Years Old | Latest News | wboc.com
text:
DOVER, Del. -- On Wednesday, certified election results confirmed Dover City Councilman Fred Neil's reelection to serve the city's third district.
At 91, Neil is the oldest serving council member in Dover City Council history. He says the number is simply "a statement of his age."
"I can't dance as fast as I used to, but I still can dance," says Neil with a laugh. "The sense of humor is still with me, and I usually use it judiciously when things get a little tight in the council."
With nearly 67% of the votes in the third district race, Neil beat Jo Ann Mather to reclaim his seat.
"If you look to see what I've accomplished within a ten-year period, if that was satisfactory to them, why stop?" asks Neil. "I'm so glad that I'm elected with my constituents because we have the experience, and we already started to do things that we need to do."
Neil says he will continue to prioritize Dover's affordable housing issue and find a way to limit skyrocketing rental costs.
"The gap between people who are low and fixed income is growing farther and farther in terms of what they can afford," Neil says. "You can't build it fast enough in order to get ahead of the problem."
Neil says this will likely be his final term.
"I'm going to be a public servant, and that's the idea behind it," Neil says. "I find great satisfaction from that.

author: Terrafemina
title: Une enqu√™te sur un cardinal canadien est class√©e, et l'avocat de la plaignante d√©nonce le Vatican - Terrafemina
text: Le Vatican a annonc√© mardi classer l'enqu√™te sur l'influent cardinal canadien G√©rald Cyprien Lacroix, soup√ßonn√© d'agression sexuelle sur une mineure dans son pays, en se fondant sur un rapport command√© par le pape Fran√ßois √† un ancien juge qu√©b√©cois. "Ce rapport ne permet pas d'identifier quelque geste d'inconduite ou d'abus de la part du cardinal", a affirm√© mardi le Vatican dans un communiqu√©. "Une proc√©dure canonique plus pouss√©e n'est pas envisag√©e" contre ce proche conseiller du pape Fran√ßois, conclut-il. Une d√©cision qui n'a pas surpris l'avocat canadien de la plaignante. "En rien cela n'est synonyme d'un syst√®me de justice ind√©pendant", a d√©clar√© √† l'AFP Me Alain Arsenault, qui d√©nonce une proc√©dure "vici√©e". √Çg√© de 66 ans, G√©rald Cyprien Lacroix est soup√ßonn√© d'"attouchements" sur une mineure dans le cadre d'une action collective visant plus d'une centaine de membres du dioc√®se de Qu√©bec. Cette action ouverte en 2022 regroupe les t√©moignages de 147 personnes. Selon le document judiciaire consult√© par l'AFP, celui qui est archev√™que de Qu√©bec depuis 2011 et cardinal depuis 2014 aurait proc√©d√© √† des "attouchements" sur une mineure de 17 ans au moment des faits reproch√©s, entre 1987 et 1988. Face √† cette affaire, le pape Fran√ßois avait demand√© en f√©vrier √† l'ex-juge Andr√© Denis "de conduire une enqu√™te portant sur les faits, les circonstances et l'imputabilit√© du d√©lit all√©gu√©". Une premi√®re pour le Vatican qui n'avait jamais confi√© √† un la√Øc une enqu√™te visant un cardinal. Selon le Vatican, le juge Denis a conclu son enqu√™te pr√©liminaire le 6 mai et ses conclusions ont √©t√© communiqu√©es "les jours suivants" au pape, qui a donc avalis√© la d√©cision d'abandonner la proc√©dure canonique √† l'encontre du cardinal Lacroix, l'un des neuf membres du C9, le conseil des neuf cardinaux qui l'assiste dans le gouvernement de l'Eglise et se r√©unit r√©guli√®rement au Vatican. "Jamais, √† ma connaissance, je n'ai pos√© de gestes inappropri√©s envers qui que ce soit, qu'il s'agisse de personnes mineures ou adultes", s'√©tait d√©fendu fin janvier le pr√©lat. "Les √©l√©ments recueillis au cours de mon enqu√™te rendent peu plausibles que les faits reproch√©s au cardinal se soient produits", a conclu le juge Denis. "La grande faiblesse de mon rapport est que je n'ai pas rencontr√© la demanderesse", a-t-il toutefois reconnu lors d'une conf√©rence de presse √† Qu√©bec. Cette derni√®re a refus√© de le rencontrer, r√©servant ses d√©clarations √† la "justice", mais elle maintient "√©videmment toutes ces accusations", a confi√© son avocat qui ajoute recevoir chaque semaine de nouveaux t√©moignages qui vient s'ajouter √† l'action collective. R√©it√©rant son innocence, le cardinal Lacroix va demeurer en retrait encore un certain temps "pour favoriser un r√®glement de l'action collective", a indiqu√© le dioc√®se de Qu√©bec dans un communiqu√©. Depuis l'√©lection du pape Fran√ßois en 2013, au moins trois autres cardinaux ont √©t√© m√™l√©s √† des accusations d'agressions sexuelles, dont Marc Ouellet, lui aussi canadien, qui occupait jusqu'en 2023 l'une des fonctions les plus importantes au sein de la Curie, l'administration centrale du Saint-Si√®ge. Ce dernier a toujours ni√© "fermement" des accusations "diffamatoires". Fin 2022, le cardinal fran√ßais Jean-Pierre Ricard, ancien archev√™que de Bordeaux, avait reconnu avoir eu un comportement "r√©pr√©hensible" avec une adolescente il y a 35 ans. L'enqu√™te de la justice fran√ßaise pour "agression sexuelle aggrav√©e" a √©t√© class√©e sans suite en raison de la prescription des faits, mais une enqu√™te du Vatican se poursuit. En 2019, le pape Fran√ßois avait d√©froqu√© l'ancien archev√™que de Washington, Theodore McCarrick, sanction quasi-in√©dite dans l'histoire de l'Eglise concernant un cardinal, apr√®s que le Vatican l'eut reconnu coupable d'avoir agress√© sexuellement au moins un adolescent de 16 ans en 1974, et d'avoir eu un comportement sexuel d√©plac√© aupr√®s de s√©minaristes adultes. La lutte contre les violences sexuelles dans l'Eglise constitue l'un des chantiers du pontificat de Fran√ßois, qui d√©fend une politique de "tol√©rance z√©ro" face √† la multiplication des scandales tout en reconnaissant que l'Eglise doit "faire plus" contre ce fl√©au. Le pape argentin a cr√©√© une commission consultative pour la protection des mineurs, lev√© le secret pontifical sur les violences sexuelles du clerg√© et oblig√© religieux et la√Øcs √† signaler tout cas √† leur hi√©rarchie. Mais le secret de la confession demeure absolu et les associations de victimes r√©clament davantage de mesures. glr-tib/bpe ¬© Agence France-Presse

author: BF Staff
title: In North Carolina, FUJIFILM Diosynth Investing $1.2B To Expand Biopharma Manufacturing
text: In Holly Springs, North Carolina, FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies North Carolina, Inc. will invest $1.2 billion to expand its biopharmaceutical manufacturing facility, creating 680 new jobs in Wake County. Initial investments of the FUJIFILM‚Äôs Holly Springs operation included $2 billion in 2021, making it the largest end-to-end biopharmaceutical manufacturing facility in North America. ‚ÄúNorth Carolina is known worldwide as a biotechnology hub thanks to the continued investment from companies like FUJIFILM Diosynth,‚Äù said Christopher Chung, CEO of the [Economic Development Partnership of North Carolina](http://www.edpnc.com). ‚ÄúOur robust infrastructure, top-notch engineering talent in the state, and partnerships with entities like NC State University and the North Carolina Biotechnology Center provide support for innovative companies like FUJIFILM to continue to grow.‚Äù In October 2023, North Carolina Governor Roy Cooper, North Carolina Department of Commerce Secretary Sanders, and Chung met in Japan with leaders from Japanese businesses in North Carolina, including FUJIFILM President and CEO Teiichi Goto, to discuss the continued partnership and the company‚Äôs facilities in the state. [FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies‚Äô](http://www.fujifilmdiosynth.com) expansion includes an additional large-scale monoclonal antibody Drug Substance manufacturing capacity that will support the company‚Äôs growing biologics CDMO (contract development and manufacturing organization) business. The project will also include two additional drug substance manufacturing buildings, a shared headblock building with administrative space, as well as expansions of utilities, lab, and warehouse buildings currently under construction. The average salary for new positions at FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies will be $109,923, which is notably higher than Wake County‚Äôs average wage of $74,866. Over the last 10 years (2014-2023), Japan has announced 9,220 jobs and $17.58 billion in investment in North Carolina. Currently, more than 30,500 North Carolinians work for Japanese companies such as HondaJet, Morinaga, and Sumitomo Forestry. In 2021, Toyota announced it would build its first North American battery manufacturing plant in Liberty, NC, investing $1.29 billion and creating 1,750 jobs. Since then, Toyota has announced three additional expansions [bringing the project‚Äôs total capital investment to $13.9 billion and 5,000 new jobs](https://businessfacilities.com/2023-deals-of-the-year/). More recently, Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd., a lithium-ion battery pouch manufacturer, announced it will invest $233 million to build its first U.S. advanced manufacturing facility in Linwood, NC, creating 352 new jobs in Davidson County. The Economic Development Partnership of North Carolina recognizes the North Carolina Department of Commerce as well as other key partners involved in the project, including the North Carolina General Assembly, the North Carolina Department of Environmental Quality, the North Carolina Department of Transportation, the North Carolina Community College System, Wake Technical Community College, the North Carolina Biotechnology Center, North Carolina State University, the North Carolina Japan Center, Dominion Energy, Duke Energy, Capital Area Workforce Development, Wake County, the Town of Holly Springs, and Wake County Economic Development, a program of the Raleigh Chamber. [Check out all the latest news related to North Carolina economic development, corporate relocation, corporate expansion, and site selection.](https://businessfacilities.com/ssg/north-carolina-state-profile/#latestNews)

organizations.name: fujifilm diosynth biotechnologies north carolina, inc.
economic development partnership of north carolina

author: manbobi
title: #146 "Nunca ser√≠a alcaldesa con los votos de EH Bildu. Prefiero fregar escaleras"
text:
[HackerRuso](/user/HackerRuso)a [twitter.com](/go/link/3891414) [#97](c97#c-97) Irene montero fuera de sus estudios trabaj√≥ de cajera en un supermercado, algo que el clasismo facheril critic√≥ mucho en su momento, algo no muy diferente del clasismo de esta se√±ora del art√≠culo.
Como si haber sido cajera en tu vida fuera una lacra o algo as√≠, por otro lado ser comunity manager del perro de un pol√≠tico es MUY valorado por la misma gente.
[#103](c103#c-103) A ver, Irene Montero trabaj√≥ un a√±o de cajera. No tiene ninguna carrera profesional (aunque sea de cajera) ni profesi√≥n a la que volver, como s√≠ tienen Pablo Iglesias o Monedero, que volvieron a sus respectivos trabajos y profesiones.
Hasta Ayuso se supone que trabaj√≥ de periodista en distintos sitios, no solo haciendo de perro de la Aguirre. Digo se supone porque me f√≠o poco de la Ayusa sin verificar su curr√≠culum, pero se supone que es as√≠.
Y con esto yo no invalidaba que la se√±ora del pep√© que anda llorando porque le han dado la patada haya trabajado en algo real (que ni lo s√© ni me importa, no me extra√±ar√≠a que se hubiera tocado el higo toda su vida), sino contestaba al comentario de
[#46](c46#c-46) que habla de M√≥nica Garc√≠a, la cual tiene una carrera profesional como m√©dico anestesista en el 12 de Octubre.
[#105](c105#c-105) Entre 2011 y 2013 curs√≥ y obtuvo el grado de m√°ster en psicolog√≠a de la educaci√≥n.11 Posteriormente, gracias a su rendimiento acad√©mico, obtuvo una ayuda para contratos predoctorales de Formaci√≥n de Profesorado Universitario (FPU) en la UAM entre 2013 y 2015, consiguiendo a ra√≠z de esta una estancia formativa en la Universidad de Harvard, que rechaz√≥ por su compromiso pol√≠tico... https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irene_Montero
Sobre muchos de los dirigentes de podemos y sobre el mismo Podemos se han lanzado tantos bulos y mentiras que en su vida se le quitara ya el San Benito de todos esos bulos. Pero no por ello hay que dejar de rebatirlo cuando se comenta.
[#125](c125#c-125) Efectivamente, fue a la uni. Y efectivamente, no trabaj√≥ jam√°s (solo de cajera un a√±o). Ni tiene carrera profesional a la que volver, porque nunca ha trabajado de nada (m√°s all√° de su breve periodo de cajera un a√±o).
As√≠ que s√≠, gracias por complementar con el enlace de su entrada en la Wiki para corroborar que no trabaj√≥ en su vida. Y por eso no puede volver a nada como s√≠ pudieron volver a lo suyo el propio Pablo, Monedero, Luis Alegre o Bescansa, que ten√≠an todos su profesi√≥n desde hac√≠a muchos a√±os.
[#105](c105#c-105) Ayuso hace 20 a√±os que dej√≥ de hacer de periodista, se supone que en una radio en Irlanda y otra en Colombia, cobrar del chiringuito Madrid Networks no es trabajar.
[#105](c105#c-105) Irene montero :
Doctora en Derecho Constitucional por la Universidad de Valladolid, master en Derecho Internacional por el Instituto de Estudios Pol√≠ticos para Am√©rica Latina y √Åfrica (Iepala) y licenciada en Derecho por la Universidad de Valladolid. Profesora Titular de Derecho Constitucional en la Universidad de Valladolid.
Ya quisieran muchos de nuestros politicastros tener una formaci√≥n similar.
Montero se ha dedicado siempre a la pol√≠tica. Lo de no darle un palo al agua y ser la mujer de qui√©n es ya est√° bastante de m√°s.
Puede que no te gusten sus ideas pol√≠ticas pero no veo yo masters falsos ni carreras sacadas en seis meses, ni mentiras varias, ni doctorados que no son, ni Harvard de tres d√≠as.
Vamos, que su carrera profesional est√° orientada a la pol√≠tica. Si eso no es una carrera profesional..... No se ni para que existe la carrera de ciencias pol√≠ticas entonces.
[#137](c137#c-137) JAJAJAJAJA ESE NO ES EL CURRICULUM DE MONTERO!!!!!!!!!
ES EL DE LA MINISTRA DE IGUALDAD ACTUAL, Ana Redondo Garc√≠a, DEL PSOE!!!
Irene Montero ni es doctora ni es n√°!!!!!!!!!! JAJAJAJAJA
[#138](c138#c-138) mis disculpas. Trabajos predoctorales. Toma, de la raz√≥n:
La hoy ministra de Igualdad es licenciada en Psicolog√≠a por la Universidad Aut√≥noma de Madrid, una carrera en la que, seg√∫n cita el curr√≠culum ‚Äúestudi√≥ con ayudas al estudio por aprovechamiento excelente‚Äù y por la que fue puntuada con una calificaci√≥n de 9,09. Adem√°s, Irene Montero ha realizado un M√°ster en Psicolog√≠a de la Educaci√≥n por la Universidad Aut√≥noma de Madrid, donde obtuvo 9 matr√≠culas de honor y la calificaci√≥n de 9,5 en la tesis de m√°ster.
Google de inicio igual me ha traicionado.
Paso de discutir con JAJAJAS
[#139](c139#c-139) Vamos, que ni conoc√≠as su curr√≠culum ni te importaba
El JAJAJAJA es l√≥gico ante ese sin sentido.
Y s√≠, su curr√≠culum real es el que pones y que yo ya conoc√≠a (por eso me descojon√© al ver el que pusiste, que nada ten√≠a que ver con el real... vaya tela): fue estudiante, solo eso. Y luego a tocarse los cojones en la pol√≠tica. No ha dado palo al agua en su vida, no ha trabajado en su vida. Es m√°s in√∫til que Ayuso, lo siento.
Y lo que dices de Ciencias Pol√≠ticas... eso es lo que estudiaron Pablo Iglesias, Monedero, Bescansa entre otros. Son polit√≥logos. Y ellos S√ç tienen un lugar al que volver, porque ten√≠an y tienen una carrera profesional detr√°s, que no implica ser chupabotes. Cosa que no tiene Montero. Irene Montero no tiene una profesi√≥n a la que volver, as√≠ que necesita que sus fangirls y sus seguidores le voten mucho para poder seguir viviendo del cuento toda su vida.
El 15M ven√≠a a acabar con liderazgos eternos y pol√≠ticos profesionales, vividores del cuento y de la mamandurria. Todo lo contrario de lo que representa ahora mismo Irene Montero, pasando a ser Podemos un viejo club pol√≠tico old school m√°s.
[#103](c103#c-103) Me gusta ver a los 2 esos que van de izquierdas y quedan como cu√±aos clasistas a la m√≠nima. El pony dijo el otro d√≠a que Pablo Iglesias es un maltratador. Para que veas el nivel.
[#97](c97#c-97) No, el equivalente a Monica Garcia (medico anestesista). Esta de UPN (que no del PP como dije erroneamente) fue medico de urgencias:
"Fue m√©dica de urgencias del Hospital de Navarra y de algunos centros de atenci√≥n primaria del Servicio Navarro de Salud, trabajando despu√©s en gesti√≥n de salud."
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristina_Ibarrola
[#110](c110#c-110) Ah co√±o
Al ser del PP daba por hecho que te refer√≠as a que no hab√≠a trabajado de nada en su vida (o lo daba por hecho yo).
[#10](c10#c-10) suelen ir de la mano. Lo que entiendo es que tienen tantos votos porque hay mucho millonario wannabe.
[#102](c102#c-102) Son como muchisimo "regionalistas". Hubo una escisi√≥n de "nacionalistas navarros" que era el CDN pero no dur√≥ muchoas legislaturas teniendo esca√±os
Estos requet√©s, han tenido el ayuntamiento 4 a√±os sin tener mayor√≠a y se pensaban que ahora iba a ser igual, m√°s en minor√≠a. Encima, se permiten el lujo de pelearse con el PP, para sumar menos a√∫n.
[#65](c65#c-65) plant√©atelo de la siguiente manera:
Ni loco ser√≠a presidente con el apoyo de bildu. Antes har√≠a inserta tu trabajo aqu√≠.
[#108](c108#c-108) tu trabajo ser√° c√≥modo, pero lo que debes tener en cuenta en esa frase es el tono despectivo con el que se habla de tu trabajo.
[#17](c17#c-17) pocos de aqu√≠ se han dedicado a eso profesionalmente. No vayamos de lo que no somos. Si acaso nos ha tocado fregar el rellano nuestro y ya.
[#25](c25#c-25) Todo depende del contexto y de qui√©n lo dice. No es lo mismo que lo digamos t√∫ o yo, que pueden venirnos mal dadas y efectivamente podemos acabar fregando escaleras o fregando platos en cualquier sitio para poder salir adelante, a que lo diga alguien bien acomodado desde las instituciones.
Es una frase clasista cuando la espera alguien desde el poder. Es clasista e indignante.
[#77](c77#c-77) Igual es que interesa pasar la frase por el filtro ideol√≥gico, porque seg√∫n la experiencia de miles de millones, al igual que otros trabajos duros, mal pagados y poco reconocidos, fregar escaleras no le gusta ni al "Tato".
Me temo que si en lugar de decir la frase "prefiero fregar escaleras" hubiera sido "prefiero escarbar cebollinos", seguro que muchos de los presentes sacar√≠an punta a la frase, alegando una afrenta al colectivo de agricultores.

author: Notimerica
title: La capa de hielo global bate m√≠nimos en el tercer febrero m√°s c√°lido
text: MADRID, 6 Mar. (EUROPA PRESS) - La extensi√≥n diaria del hielo marino global, que combina las extensiones de hielo marino en ambas regiones polares, alcanz√≥ un nuevo m√≠nimo hist√≥rico a principios de febrero y se mantuvo por debajo del r√©cord anterior de febrero de 2023 durante el resto del mes, seg√∫n el servicio de cambio clim√°tico Copernicus (C3S). El hielo marino del √Årtico alcanz√≥ su extensi√≥n mensual m√°s baja en febrero, un 8 % por debajo de la media. Esto marca el tercer mes consecutivo en el que la extensi√≥n del hielo marino ha establecido un r√©cord para el mes correspondiente. El hielo marino ant√°rtico alcanz√≥ su cuarta extensi√≥n mensual m√°s baja en febrero, un 26 % por debajo de la media. La extensi√≥n diaria del hielo marino puede haber alcanzado su m√≠nimo anual cerca del final del mes. Si se confirma, ser√≠a el segundo m√≠nimo m√°s bajo en el registro satelital. Esta confirmaci√≥n solo ser√° posible a principios de marzo. Es importante se√±alar que el nuevo m√≠nimo hist√≥rico para el √Årtico en febrero no es un m√≠nimo hist√≥rico. El hielo marino del √Årtico se est√° acercando actualmente a su extensi√≥n m√°xima anual, que normalmente ocurre en marzo, advierte el informe. Febrero de 2025 fue el tercer febrero m√°s c√°lido a nivel mundial, con una temperatura media del aire en superficie de 13,36 ¬∞C, 0,63 ¬∞C por encima de la media de febrero de 1991-2020, y solo marginalmente m√°s c√°lida, en 0,03 ¬∞C, que el cuarto febrero m√°s c√°lido de 2020. El mes pasado fue 1,59 ¬∞C superior a la media estimada de 1850-1900 utilizada para definir el nivel preindustrial y fue el decimonoveno mes de los √∫ltimos 20 meses* en el que la temperatura media global del aire en superficie fue m√°s de 1,5 ¬∞C superior a la del nivel preindustrial. La temperatura media global del invierno boreal de 2025 (de diciembre de 2024 a febrero de 2025) fue la segunda m√°s alta registrada, con 0,71 ¬∞C por encima de la media de 1991-2020 para esos tres meses, 0,05 ¬∞C m√°s fr√≠a que el r√©cord establecido para el invierno boreal de 2024. El per√≠odo de 12 meses de marzo de 2024 a febrero de 2025 fue 0,71 ¬∞C superior a la media de 1991-2020 y 1,59 ¬∞C superior al nivel preindustrial. Seg√∫n Samantha Burgess, directora estrat√©gica para el clima del ECMWF (European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts), dijo: "Febrero de 2025 contin√∫a la racha de temperaturas r√©cord o casi r√©cord observada durante los √∫ltimos dos a√±os. Una de las consecuencias de un mundo m√°s c√°lido es el derretimiento del hielo marino, y la cobertura de hielo marino r√©cord o casi r√©cord en ambos polos ha llevado la cobertura de hielo marino global a un m√≠nimo hist√≥rico". La temperatura media en tierra firme europea en febrero de 2025 fue de 0,44 ¬∞C, 0,40 ¬∞C por encima de la media de febrero de 1991-2020, lo que la sit√∫a muy por encima de los 10 meses m√°s c√°lidos de febrero en Europa. Las temperaturas europeas fueron m√°s altas que la media en el norte de Fennoscandia, Islandia y los Alpes. En Europa oriental se registr√≥ una gran regi√≥n de anomal√≠as negativas. Fuera de Europa, las temperaturas fueron m√°s altas que la media en grandes partes del √Årtico. Tambi√©n fueron superiores a la media en el norte de Chile y Argentina, el oeste de Australia y el suroeste de Estados Unidos y M√©xico. Las temperaturas fueron notablemente inferiores a la media en partes de Estados Unidos y Canad√°. Otras regiones con temperaturas inferiores a la media incluyen las regiones adyacentes a los mares Negro, Caspio y Mediterr√°neo oriental, as√≠ como en una gran regi√≥n del este de Asia, que abarca partes del sur de Rusia, Mongolia, China y Jap√≥n.
